mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BMJZSJ`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DCBJB`, t1.`DCBLX`, t1.`DCDXLX`, t1.`DCJZRQ`, t1.`DCSCJD`, t1.`DCSCND`, t1.`DCYGLB`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`ND`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t31.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PXBMC`, t1.`PXDD`, t1.`PXDX`, t1.`PXJSSJ`, t1.`PXKSSJ`, t1.`PXMK`, t1.`PXRS`, t1.`PXZYNR`, t1.`SFFB`, t1.`TRMDEMDEFTIONID`, t1.`TRMDEMDEFTIONNAME`, t1.`TRMDEPARTID`, t41.`TRMDEPARTNAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINCOURSEID`, t11.`TRMTRAINCOURSENAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINFILLINID`, t21.`TRMTRAINFILLINNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t1.`XQFL`, t1.`ZDSJ` FROM `T_TRMDEMDEFTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINCOURSE t11 ON t1.TRMTRAINCOURSEID = t11.TRMTRAINCOURSEID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINFILLIN t21 ON t1.TRMTRAINFILLINID = t21.TRMTRAINFILLINID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t1.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_TRMDEPART t41 ON t1.TRMDEPARTID = t41.TRMDEPARTID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.BMJZSJ, t1.BZ, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DCBJB, t1.DCBLX, t1.DCDXLX, t1.DCJZRQ, t1.DCSCJD, t1.DCSCND, t1.DCYGLB, t1.ENABLE, t1.ND, t1.ORMORGID, t31.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t51.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PXBMC, t1.PXDD, t1.PXDX, t1.PXJSSJ, t1.PXKSSJ, t1.PXMK, t1.PXRS, t1.PXZYNR, t1.SFFB, t1.TRMDEMDEFTIONID, t1.TRMDEMDEFTIONNAME, t1.TRMDEPARTID, t41.TRMDEPARTNAME, t1.TRMTRAINCOURSEID, t11.TRMTRAINCOURSENAME, t1.TRMTRAINFILLINID, t21.TRMTRAINFILLINNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t1.XQFL, t1.ZDSJ FROM T_TRMDEMDEFTION t1 LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINCOURSE t11 ON t1.TRMTRAINCOURSEID = t11.TRMTRAINCOURSEID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINFILLIN t21 ON t1.TRMTRAINFILLINID = t21.TRMTRAINFILLINID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t1.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_TRMDEPART t41 ON t1.TRMDEPARTID = t41.TRMDEPARTID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
